comment._content: Dumping hazzardous wastes in 1940 was great for growing crops

comment.author: 66797639@N02
comment._content: My parents owned rental properties and a mobile home park when I was a kid and working alongside my dad doing plumbing, electrical, carpentry, digging ditches, whatever it took, that's what we did.   It's called the real world everywhere except our Hollywood-ized version of America.   Oh, and I turned out just fine.. don't hate my folks for making me do what was needed to get us ahead in the world... I'm a better person for it.
